query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Vago già di cercar dentro e dintorno 2 la divina foresta spessa e viva, 3 ch’a li occhi temperava il novo giorno,
4 sanza più aspettar, lasciai la riva, 5 prendendo la campagna lento lento 6 su per lo suol che d’ogne parte auliva.
query.result:
**English:**
1 I was already wandering to search within and around 2 the divine, thick, and living forest, 3 which tempered the new day to my eyes,
4 without waiting any longer, I left the shore, 5 taking the countryside slowly, slowly 6 up over the ground that smelled sweet on every side.
**Malay:**
1 Aku sudah mengembara untuk mencari di dalam dan di sekitar 2 hutan suci yang lebat dan hidup, 3 yang menyejukkan hari yang baru di mataku,
4 tanpa menunggu lebih lama lagi, aku meninggalkan pantai, 5 mengambil jalan setapak perlahan-lahan 6 ke atas tanah yang harum di setiap sisinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Tutte l’acque che son di qua più monde, 29 parrieno avere in sé mistura alcuna 30 verso di quella, che nulla nasconde,
31 avvegna che si mova bruna bruna 32 sotto l’ombra perpetüa, che mai 33 raggiar non lascia sole ivi né luna.
query.result:
**English:**
28 All the waters that are purer than this, 29 would seem to have some impurity in them 30 compared to that, which conceals nothing,
31 although it moves dark and murky 32 under the perpetual shade, which never 33 lets the sun or moon shine there.
**Malay:**
28 Semua air yang lebih murni dari ini, 29 akan tampak memiliki beberapa kekotoran di dalamnya 30 dibandingkan dengan itu, yang tidak menyembunyikan apa pun,
31 meskipun bergerak gelap dan keruh 32 di bawah naungan abadi, yang tidak pernah 33 membiarkan matahari atau bulan bersinar di sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Coi piè ristetti e con li occhi passai 35 di là dal fiumicello, per mirare 36 la gran varïazion d’i freschi mai;
37 e là m’apparve, sì com’ elli appare 38 subitamente cosa che disvia 39 per maraviglia tutto altro pensare,
40 una donna soletta che si gia 41 e cantando e scegliendo fior da fiore 42 ond’ era pinta tutta la sua via.
query.result:
**English:**
34 With feet at rest and with my eyes I passed 35 beyond the little river, to gaze 36 at the great variety of the fresh meadows;
37 and there appeared to me, just as it appears 38 suddenly, something that diverts 39 every other thought through wonder,
40 a solitary woman who was going 41 singing and choosing flower from flower 42 with which her path was all painted.
**Malay:**
34 Dengan kaki yang berhenti dan dengan mataku aku melangkah 35 dari sana menyeberangi sungai kecil, untuk melihat 36 variasi yang besar dari padang rumput yang segar;
37 dan di sana tampak olehku, sebagaimana ia tampak 38 tiba-tiba, sesuatu yang mengalihkan 39 setiap pikiran lainnya melalui keajaiban,
40 seorang wanita sendirian yang sedang berjalan 41 bernyanyi dan memilih bunga dari bunga 42 yang dengannya seluruh jalannya dilukis.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 «Deh, bella donna, che a’ raggi d’amore 44 ti scaldi, s’i’ vo’ credere a’ sembianti 45 che soglion esser testimon del core,
46 vegnati in voglia di trarreti avanti», 47 diss’ io a lei, «verso questa rivera, 48 tanto ch’io possa intender che tu canti.
query.result:
**English:**
43 "Oh, beautiful lady, who in the rays of love 44 warm yourself, if I may believe the signs 45 that are usually witnesses of the heart,
46 come forward," 47 I said to her, "toward this bank, 48 so that I may understand what you are singing.
**Malay:**
43 "Wahai, wanita cantik, yang dalam sinar cinta 44 menghangatkan dirimu, jika aku boleh percaya pada tanda-tanda 45 yang biasanya menjadi saksi hati,
46 datanglah ke arahku," 47 kataku padanya, "menuju tepi sungai ini, 48 sehingga aku dapat mengerti apa yang kau nyanyikan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Tu mi fai rimembrar dove e qual era 50 Proserpina nel tempo che perdette 51 la madre lei, ed ella primavera».
query.result:
**English:**
49 You make me remember where and what Proserpina was like 50 at the time when she lost 51 her mother, and she [lost] spring.
**Malay:**
49 Engkau membuatku mengingat di mana dan seperti apa Proserpina 50 pada saat dia kehilangan 51 ibunya, dan dia [kehilangan] musim semi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Come si volge, con le piante strette 53 a terra e intra sé, donna che balli, 54 e piede innanzi piede a pena mette,
55 volsesi in su i vermigli e in su i gialli 56 fioretti verso me, non altrimenti 57 che vergine che li occhi onesti avvalli;
58 e fece i prieghi miei esser contenti, 59 sì appressando sé, che ’l dolce suono 60 veniva a me co’ suoi intendimenti.
query.result:
**English:**
52 As a lady turns, with feet close together, 53 to the ground and within herself, dancing, 54 and places one foot in front of the other with difficulty,
55 she turned toward me on the crimson and yellow 56 flowers, not otherwise 57 than a virgin who lowers her honest eyes;
58 and she made my prayers be answered, 59 approaching me so that the sweet sound 60 came to me with its intentions.
**Malay:**
52 Seperti seorang wanita menari, dengan kaki rapat 53 ke tanah dan di dalam dirinya sendiri, 54 dan melangkahkan satu kaki di depan kaki lainnya dengan susah payah,
55 dia berbalik ke arahku di atas bunga-bunga 56 merah dan kuning, tidak lain 57 selain seorang perawan yang menundukkan pandangan matanya yang jujur;
58 dan dia membuat doa-doaku terkabul, 59 mendekatiku sehingga suara yang merdu itu 60 datang kepadaku dengan maksudnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Tosto che fu là dove l’erbe sono 62 bagnate già da l’onde del bel fiume, 63 di levar li occhi suoi mi fece dono.
query.result:
**English:**
61 As soon as he was there where the grasses are 62 already moistened by the waves of the beautiful river, 63 he made me the gift of raising my eyes.
**Malay:**
61 Segera setelah dia berada di tempat rerumputan 62 yang sudah dibasahi oleh ombak sungai yang indah, 63 dia memberiku hadiah untuk mengangkat mataku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Non credo che splendesse tanto lume 65 sotto le ciglia a Venere, trafitta 66 dal figlio fuor di tutto suo costume.
query.result:
**English:**
64 I do not believe that so much light shone 65 under the eyelids of Venus, pierced 66 by her son, beyond all his usual custom.
**Malay:**
64 Aku tidak percaya bahwa begitu banyak cahaya bersinar 65 di bawah kelopak mata Venus, yang tertusuk 66 oleh putranya, di luar semua kebiasaannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Ella ridea da l’altra riva dritta, 68 trattando più color con le sue mani, 69 che l’alta terra sanza seme gitta.
query.result:
**English:**
67 She was laughing from the other bank, 68 beckoning to me with her hands, 69 more than the high ground casts seedless.
**Malay:**
67 Dia tertawa dari seberang sungai, 68 melambaikan tangannya kepadaku, 69 lebih dari tanah tinggi yang menabur benih.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Tre passi ci facea il fiume lontani; 71 ma Elesponto, là ’ve passò Serse, 72 ancora freno a tutti orgogli umani,
73 più odio da Leandro non sofferse 74 per mareggiare intra Sesto e Abido, 75 che quel da me perch’ allor non s’aperse.
query.result:
**English:**
70 The river made us take three steps away; 71 but the Hellespont, where Xerxes crossed, 72 still a bridle to all human pride,
73 did not suffer more hatred from Leander 74 for sailing between Sestos and Abydos, 75 than that one from me because it did not open up then.
**Malay:**
70 Sungai itu membuat kami mengambil tiga langkah menjauh; 71 tetapi Hellespont, tempat Xerxes menyeberang, 72 masih menjadi kekang bagi semua kesombongan manusia,
73 tidak menderita lebih banyak kebencian dari Leander 74 karena berlayar di antara Sestos dan Abydos, 75 daripada yang itu dariku karena saat itu tidak terbuka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 «Voi siete nuovi, e forse perch’ io rido», 77 cominciò ella, «in questo luogo eletto 78 a l’umana natura per suo nido,
79 maravigliando tienvi alcun sospetto; 80 ma luce rende il salmo Delectasti, 81 che puote disnebbiar vostro intelletto.
query.result:
**English:**
76 "You are new, and perhaps because I am laughing," 77 she began, "in this place chosen 78 for human nature as its nest,
79 a certain suspicion keeps you wondering; 80 but the psalm Delectasti sheds light, 81 which can dispel the fog from your intellect.
**Malay:**
76 "Kamu semua baru, dan mungkin karena aku tertawa," 77 mulailah dia, "di tempat pilihan ini 78 untuk sifat manusia sebagai sarangnya,
79 suatu kecurigaan membuatmu bertanya-tanya; 80 tetapi mazmur Delectasti memancarkan cahaya, 81 yang dapat menghilangkan kabut dari intelekmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 E tu che se’ dinanzi e mi pregasti, 83 dì s’altro vuoli udir; ch’i’ venni presta 84 ad ogne tua question tanto che basti».
query.result:
**English:**
82 And you who are in front and asked me, 83 tell me if you want to hear more; for I came quickly 84 to every question of yours, so that it may suffice.
**Malay:**
82 Dan kamu yang berada di depan dan memintaku, 83 katakan jika kamu ingin mendengar lebih banyak; karena aku datang dengan cepat 84 untuk setiap pertanyaanmu, sehingga itu mungkin cukup.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 «L’acqua», diss’ io, «e ’l suon de la foresta 86 impugnan dentro a me novella fede 87 di cosa ch’io udi’ contraria a questa».
query.result:
**English:**
85 "The water," I said, "and the sound of the forest 86 compel within me a new faith 87 in something that I heard contrary to this."
**Malay:**
85 "Air," kataku, "dan bunyi hutan 86 memaksaku untuk memiliki keyakinan baru 87 terhadap sesuatu yang kudengar bertentangan dengan ini."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Ond’ ella: «Io dicerò come procede 89 per sua cagion ciò ch’ammirar ti face, 90 e purgherò la nebbia che ti fiede.
query.result:
**English:**
88 Then she said: "I will tell you how it happens 89 that what makes you wonder is caused by her, 90 and I will clear away the fog that troubles you.
**Malay:**
88 Kemudian dia berkata: "Aku akan memberitahumu bagaimana hal itu terjadi 89 karena dialah yang membuatmu heran, 90 dan aku akan menyingkirkan kabut yang menyusahkanmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Lo sommo Ben, che solo esso a sé piace, 92 fé l’uom buono e a bene, e questo loco 93 diede per arr’ a lui d’etterna pace.
query.result:
**English:**
91 The highest Good, which alone pleases itself, 92 made man good and for good, and this place 93 he gave as earnest of eternal peace to him.
**Malay:**
91 Kebaikan tertinggi, yang hanya menyenangkan dirinya sendiri, 92 menjadikan manusia baik dan untuk kebaikan, dan tempat ini 93 diberikan sebagai tanda jadi kedamaian abadi baginya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Per sua difalta qui dimorò poco; 95 per sua difalta in pianto e in affanno 96 cambiò onesto riso e dolce gioco.
query.result:
**English:**
94 Because of her fault, he stayed there for a short time; 95 because of her fault, he changed honest laughter and sweet play 96 into weeping and sorrow.
**Malay:**
94 Kerana kesalahannya, dia tinggal di sana untuk waktu yang singkat; 95 kerana kesalahannya, dia mengubah tawa yang jujur dan permainan yang manis 96 menjadi tangisan dan kesedihan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Perché ’l turbar che sotto da sé fanno 98 l’essalazion de l’acqua e de la terra, 99 che quanto posson dietro al calor vanno,
100 a l’uomo non facesse alcuna guerra, 101 questo monte salìo verso ’l ciel tanto, 102 e libero n’è d’indi ove si serra.
query.result:
**English:**
97 Because the disturbance that the exhalation of the water and the earth makes beneath it, 98 which follow the heat as much as they can, 99 would not make any war on man, 100 this mountain rose toward the sky so high, 102 and is free from it where it is enclosed.
**Malay:**
97 Kerana gangguan yang dibuat oleh hembusan air dan tanah di bawahnya, 98 yang mengikuti panas sekuat tenaga, 99 tidak akan membuat peperangan terhadap manusia, 100 gunung ini naik ke langit begitu tinggi, 102 dan bebas darinya di tempat ia tertutup.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Non parrebbe di là poi maraviglia, 116 udito questo, quando alcuna pianta 117 sanza seme palese vi s’appiglia.
query.result:
**English:**
115 It would not seem a marvel there, 116 having heard this, when some plant 117 takes root there without apparent seed.
**Malay:**
115 Tidak akan tampak mengherankan di sana, 116 setelah mendengar ini, ketika beberapa tanaman 117 tumbuh di sana tanpa biji yang terlihat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 E saper dei che la campagna santa 119 dove tu se’, d’ogne semenza è piena, 120 e frutto ha in sé che di là non si schianta.
query.result:
**English:**
118 And know that the holy land 119 where you are is full of every seed, 120 and it bears fruit that does not fall from it.
**Malay:**
118 Dan ketahuilah bahwa tanah suci 119 tempatmu berada, penuh dengan segala benih, 120 dan menghasilkan buah yang tidak gugur darinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Da questa parte con virtù discende 128 che toglie altrui memoria del peccato; 129 da l’altra d’ogne ben fatto la rende.
query.result:
**English:**
127 From this side with virtue it descends, 128 which takes away from others the memory of sin; 129 from the other it renders every good deed null and void.
**Malay:**
127 Dari sisi ini dengan kebajikan ia turun, 128 yang menghapuskan ingatan orang lain akan dosa; 129 dari sisi yang lain ia menjadikan setiap perbuatan baik menjadi sia-sia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Quinci Letè; così da l’altro lato 131 Eünoè si chiama, e non adopra 132 se quinci e quindi pria non è gustato:
133 a tutti altri sapori esto è di sopra.
query.result:
**English:**
130 Hence Lethe; thus on the other side 131 Eunoe is called, and it does not work 132 unless first tasted from here and there:
133 to all other flavors this is superior.
**Malay:**
130 Dari situ Lethe; demikian juga di sisi yang lain 131 Eunoe namanya, dan tidak berfungsi 132 kecuali pertama kali dicicipi dari sini dan sana:
133 bagi semua rasa lainnya ini lebih unggul.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
134 E avvegna ch’assai possa esser sazia 135 la sete tua perch’ io più non ti scuopra,
136 darotti un corollario ancor per grazia; 137 né credo che ’l mio dir ti sia men caro, 138 se oltre promession teco si spazia.
query.result:
**English:**
134 And although your thirst may be well-sated 135 because I do not reveal more to you,
136 I will give you a corollary as a favor; 137 and I do not think that my speech will be less dear to you, 138 if it ranges beyond the promise with you.
**Malay:**
134 Dan meskipun dahagamu mungkin sudah terpuaskan 135 karena aku tidak mengungkapkan lebih banyak kepadamu,
136 aku akan memberimu tambahan sebagai hadiah; 137 dan aku tidak berpikir bahwa ucapanku akan kurang berharga bagimu, 138 jika ia melampaui janji denganmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Quelli ch’anticamente poetaro 140 l’età de l’oro e suo stato felice, 141 forse in Parnaso esto loco sognaro.
query.result:
**English:**
139 Those who in ancient times were poets 140 sang of the golden age and its happy state, 141 perhaps they dreamt of this place on Parnassus.
**Malay:**
139 Mereka yang pada zaman dahulu adalah penyair 140 menyanyikan zaman keemasan dan keadaannya yang bahagia, 141 mungkin mereka memimpikan tempat ini di Parnassus.
